text: Larry Banner (June 6, 1936 - November 28, 2013) was an American gymnast. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics and the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2013 deaths Category:American male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of the United States Category:Gymnasts at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Gymnasts at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles
title: Larry Banner
